title: Riot just released their "Universe" page, and honestly, I'm a little upset.
body:
[](http://s2.quickmeme.com/img/18/188cf459bac200b8bdaa6261d066154b002378ea06bd52812f9efdfe2526a841.jpg)
#I mean, are they *trying* to kill me!?  A mortal can't look at perfection and expect to live!

Ha!  I bet you were expecting a complain post!  But seriously, this thing is great.  I love it.

replies.body: how do you do the clickbait thing?

It comes naturally.

Edit: oh. You meant the picture. Fuck.
no i mean how do you make a post so that a picture shows on a subsection of the boards but not in the actual post.
Yeah I noticed that as soon as I posted.  My bad.
and yet no answer

> [{quoted}](name=All Day Tay Tay,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=ARG16xNo,comment-id=00000000000000000000,timestamp=2016-11-17T02:10:04.410+0000)
>
> and yet no answer

Put an image link as the very first line of your post.  Weirdly, it turns into the thumbnail but doesn't appear in the post.  I don't know why.

¯\\\_(ツ)_/¯
Spaghetti code? Spaghetti code.

> [{quoted}](name=Enlegacy,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=ARG16xNo,comment-id=0000000000000000000000000002,timestamp=2016-11-17T04:03:13.032+0000)
>
> Spaghetti code? Spaghetti code.

I think it may actually be intentional - just an undocumented feature.  I'm not even using that as a euphemism for bug this time, surprisingly!

That isn't how it works. An image as the first line of the thread will show up just fine (as seen here)

An image in the first line of the thread with [ ] in front of it (Which I believe means 'make this text link to this image', except there's no text) causes the image to appear in the thumbnail but not in the post. The only reason I know this is because I can always see the post in plaintext for a second when I first load in.

> [{quoted}](name=Bioluminescence,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=ARG16xNo,comment-id=000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2016-11-17T02:16:21.310+0000)
>
> Put an image link as the very first line of your post.  Weirdly, it turns into the thumbnail but doesn't appear in the post.  I don't know why.
> 
> ¯\\\_(ツ)_/¯

its this thing called "coding" i believe. idk tho i dont play infinite warfare
I can't see images on the forums anyways. So I would never notice. XD
Eh, i like the mechanic, gives us the ability to make thumbnails without having to put it in our actual post!... also great for clickbait :p

You put empty brackets followed by the link to the picture in parentheses.
Ex.  [](*Link*)

You can also do this to make a link look like text.
Ex.  [Why hello there](*Dunsparce picture link*) turns into [Why hello there](http://cdn.bulbagarden.net/upload/thumb/2/20/206Dunsparce.png/250px-206Dunsparce.png)

Also, the first image link in the post will be the thumbnail, so make sure you put it at the top.
i suspected so. thanks for the response.

You thought it was a complaint post!!

https://cdn.meme.am/instances/500x/52199772.jpg
Honestly it reminds me oh how little lore there is for some champs, especially my main {{champion:29}}

>Idolized by many, dismissed by some, mystifying to all, the curious being, Twitch, is an enigma. Protected by a foul stench, Twitch inspires increasingly disparate theories on his origin wherever he goes - from demigod, to sacred oracle, to a mere beast transformed by magic. Whatever the truth may be, Twitch keeps his own counsel and stops for no one as he roams the Sewers.
So basically like old Rammus

that ***is*** Rammus' lore. (>_>)

. . . Still.

but Rammus runs around the deserts of Shurima.

It's **totally** different.
LOL. Joke flew right on past my head
Still waiting for a short story similar to the Shadow Isles thing not too long ago, except for {{champion:29}} {{champion:112}} and the other Zaun champs

They actually finished it bunch of times already.

Still no map, at least we're getting short stories every now and then, it seems.
{{champion:81}} "Who needs a map?!"
8 new ones with this release. More lore than has come out in quite a long time.
I was preparing to write a sassy reply but then I realized I got played.
Perfection?! I don't think so, where's the map?!
I have a nitpick about the lack of Ionian content, but I'm sure that will take care of itself eventually.

ITS FUCKING RAW YOU IDIOT LOOK AT IT LOOK AT IT!!!
Umm, don't you die in a fiery explosion and get reborn as an Imass?

No, you become a wandering soul.  That is, as long as some guy who thinks he's a demigod doesn't come around and flippin' *eat* it, breaking it down into raw knowledge to fuel his Storm-Voice (eff you, Dovahkiin).
why does riot only respond to the posts that make them look good
